contents.text: Welcome to MoveWith, your personal fitness coach on the go.
For membership and session options, press 1.
To schedule or reschedule a training session, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a session scheduling specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to reschedule my personal training session to a different day this week.
I need to reschedule my physical rehab training session to Friday afternoon.
Book a one-on-one HIIT session for Thursday at 5:30 PM.
I need to change the time of my next exercise class
I need to reschedule my Friday afternoon training session to Wednesday early evening to accommodate my lab schedule.

contents.text: To manage your subscription or billing information, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to billing and subscription support.

navigationGoals: I want to update my payment method on my membership and check my next billing date.
I want to update my payment method and apply my veteran discount to my membership.
Upgrade my subscription plan to annual billing and update my credit card on file.
I would like help updating my membership payment information
I’d like to update my credit card on file for my membership and confirm when my next payment is due.

contents.text: For support and general inquiries, press 2.
For technical support and app assistance, press 1.
Please hold while our technical support team reviews your request.

navigationGoals: I can’t log into the MoveWith app on my phone and need help restoring access.
I’m getting an error when I try to load my veteran-specific workout plan in the app and need technical help.
Troubleshoot why the app isn’t syncing my smartwatch workout data.
I am having trouble opening the MoveWith app on my phone, can you assist me
The app crashes every time I try to view my workout history; can you help me troubleshoot this?

contents.text: For our location, hours, and general information, press 2.
Please hold while we retrieve our location and hours for you.

navigationGoals: I’d like the address and weekend hours for the nearest MoveWith studio.
I’d like to find the nearest MoveWith studio with evening hours that offers adaptive workouts for veterans.
Get the address, operating hours, and navigation directions to the nearest MoveWith studio in downtown SF.
Could you tell me your nearest studio address and opening hours
Could you give me the address and weekend hours for your Midtown gym location?
